142047.<center>神より与えられた この広い世界で\n我らは 姿の異なる仲間たちと:
In this wide world given to us by God, we have vowed to live together with other companions of different shapes
and sizes, supporting each other with our power. We leave the image of our beloved companions in this place, the
center of the world, with the hope that this vow will be eternal.

142039.<pc>は\n岩に 刻まれている文字を 読んだ。: <pc> read the inscription on the stone.

44567.<center>神より与えられた この広い世界で\n我らは 姿の異なる仲間たちと:
In this wide world given to us by God, we have vowed to live together with other companions of different shapes
and sizes, supporting each other with our power. We leave the image of our beloved companions in this place, the
center of the world, with the hope that this vow will be eternal.

142048.<center>『風の民 エルフ』\n自然を愛し 森と共に生きる\n背に小さな羽:
Elf, the People of the Wind, are a group of lovely people with small wings on their backs who love nature
and live together with the forests. They respect tradition and prestige, have learned the truth of the world
deeply, and have sent many excellent spell users into the world.

142049.<center>『炎の民 オーガ』\n厳しい荒野で チカラ強く生きる\n大きな身:
Ogre, the People of the Flame": A large body with horns and tails who live strongly in the harsh wilderness.
Belligerent and respectful of the strong, they risked their lives to fight for the weak and the companion
with their outstanding strength and stamina.

142050.<center>『地の民 ドワーフ』\n雄大な山々に恩恵を受け 大地と共に生きる:
The Dwarfs are a small-bodied people with large ears who live together with the earth and are blessed by the
majestic mountains. With their high technology and strong desires, they have built several advanced
civilizations with their natural dexterity and speed.

142051.<center>『水の民 ウェディ』\n海に浮かぶ美しい島々で 自由に生きる\n:
Weddie, the People of the Water, are a group of people with bodies the color of blue water who live freely on
beautiful islands in the sea. They hate constraints and cherish songs and love, and only fight to protect their
loved ones by using their speed and strength.

142052.<center>『花の民 プクリポ』\n絵本のような色彩の町で 楽しさを求めて生:
Pukulipo, the "People of Flowers" In a town of picture-book colors, these lovely, fluffy little creatures live
in search of fun. Born with strong magical powers and dexterity, they are more passionate about creating fun
than fighting and creating things.

142053.<center>『勇の民 人間』\nどんな地でも 生きていける\n大きくもなく:
The human race, the people of valor, are neither large nor small, and can survive in any land. They were thought
to be without merit, but when faced with danger, they had the courage to face it without being crushed.

142054.<center>『空の民 竜族』\nはるか かなたより\n世界を見守る 聖なる者:
The people of the sky, the dragon tribe, are the holy ones who watch over the world from afar. They are
said to have flown down to the earth when there was strife and brought peace to the world in an instant with
their great power.
